text: Juozas Žemaitis (30 August 1926 - 5 October 2021) was a Lithuanian Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Šakiai District Municipality, Lithuania. He became a priest in 1949. In 1991, Pope John Paul II made Žemaitis the Bishop of Vilkaviškis. He retired from the role in 2002. Žemaitis died on 5 October 2021 in Marijampolė, Lithuania at the age of 95.Mirė vyskupas emeritas Juozas Žemaitis ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Juozas Žemaitis
